Html: Hey sorry to be blunt, been waiting all day for this Need it to respec my Deathknight So i can go and run Ulduar (Hopefully) tomorow i have several premade Talent Specs I have (When its done, I will release them as a Talent addon for Rawr.) But i need the newest rawr to test them out. When will be the expected release? (Its 1:00am for me)
To be blunt, as already answered on the first page of threads, hopefully tonight.
Yea just requesting a update, as 4:11pm Forum time, its now 1:02am Just wanted to know.
Unfortunately, DPSDK will not be able to be updated properly until the armory reflects the 3.2 talent tree changes.
Armory is showing correct talent trees now. Does this mean the DPSDK module is in progress?
DPSDK code is checked in, it just needs a release pushed. The T9 bonuses and the new sigil are not yet implemented.
Awesome, thanks for the quick turn-around. Any idea when the release might get pushed to the public?
